title: Royal Cliff Management develops intense international language training program for employees
text:
Royal Cliff Management develops intense international language training program for employees Royal Cliff Management develops intense international language training program for employees Details Category: Hotel   11:30 Gearing towards the upcoming economic integration of the ASEAN Economic Community, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has advanced its employee training program with interactive international language workshops programmed to enhance, expand and develop necessary language skills to its new recruits and current employees. 
In addition to offering a primary hospitality training course, employees at the Royal Cliff also have the opportunity to attend language workshops for English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Russian, which are regularly conducted by native-speakers from the international team. The sessions which are well attended by over 50 people from various departments typically cover useful vocabulary and important phrases that are frequently used in their line of work. “We believe that the caliber of service, attention to detail and consistent quality delivered to our guests lie in the hands of our team members.” Mr. Vitanart Vathanakul, Executive Director of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group said. “In addition to offering fundamental tourism and hospitality training, here at the Royal Cliff, we also try to help develop our staffs’ international language skills. Not only will these courses assist our team members in excelling in their profession, but it will also benefit them in the future as they will be more competitive once Thailand enters the ASEAN Economic Community (AEC).” Situated on a 64 acre private parkland estate overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has been honored with multiple awards and recognition from organizations of national and international repute. It is home to four award winning 5-star hotels offering a sensory experience defined profoundly by its style, culture and elegance - all presented with the distinctive spirit of the State of Exclusivity and Fascination.
